hierarchy.entry_subdomain: Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act (HIPAA)

active_learning.discussion_prompt: Evaluate a real-world HIPAA breach case (e.g., a hospital posting PHI on social media without consent). Debate in groups: How could a well-crafted NPP have prevented it? What patient rights were likely violated, and how does this tie into the Minimum Necessary Standard?
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.
